creator: dparmar@commerceinsurance.com
text:
We have two Apache webservers(2.2.15) and two Tomcat servers(5.5.27.

I am using mod_jk(1.2.28) to provide a Load balancing among two tomcat instances. Somehow when I Start the application & try to login i get a message "  Session has expired. Please Refresh your browser to start a new session" . 

The application works ok if I comment out the second worker defination from the worker.properties file.

I believe there is an issue with the Session Stickyness.

We need this resolved ASAP as our target production date is 11/15/2010

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Sounds like this was something that should have been posted to the user list before filing: sticky sessions work in many environments.
